description: This seed might be more accurately compared to a bulb, because like a bulb you dug it out of the home it had made and chopped off its extremities and are now preparing to plant it in a new location; only, in this instance the hole was dug into the chest of a dead vampire minion and the new location is nestled against the still-beating heart of a patient.

What reason could anyone have making a bionic power generator that runs off the blood of vampires?  After some thought, one option that occurs to you would be the possibility that by limiting the fuel options, a vampire is also limiting the opportunities for a rogue minion to use its bionics against its master.
A jar-like container that includes a set of vocal cords with a large hood at the top of them and rootlike tendrils at the base connecting to a microchip.
A jar-like container that includes a set of oversized and reinforced vocal cords with a large hood at the top of them and rootlike tendrils at the base connecting to a microchip.
A syringe that extends out into two tubes that snake up through the nostrils and down to the lungs in order to get the spores deep into their new home, where they can best spread through the body.
A syringe that extends out into two tubes that snake up through the nostrils and down to the lungs in order to get the spores deep into their new home, where they can best spread through the body.

Implanted in the neck and sealed off via a sphincter the exhalation spray is triggered by a learned flexing of throat muscles.  A deep breath followed by a yawn like contraction of the muscles and the sphincter opens, expelling the pressurized gas in a cone in front of the user.  The body uses extra calories and vitamins to produce the pacification chemicals that will turn humans passive for 20 seconds.

Implanted in the neck and sealed off via a sphincter the exhalation spray is triggered by a learned flexing of throat muscles.  A deep breath followed by a yawn like contraction of the muscles and the sphincter opens, expelling the pressurized gas in a cone in front of the user.  The body uses extra calories and vitamins to produce the teargas to distract anything that breathes.
Chemical warfare implanted from your elbows to the palm of your hand.  Carries a variety of loads from sleep, blister, nerve and poison.
Containerized wet storage.  For that hot, hot data, you can't risk knowing.
Each of the chambers of the heart were split and made to live indepently of one another.  Greatly imrpoves surviveability of torso wounds.

Are you plagued by tension headaches from failed crafts?  Does close gunfire make you nervous?  This chip will keep you calm under pressure from a rampaging horde.  Some side effects may include lack of focus.

If you feel like you are controlled by your hunger this bionic will allow you to turn the tables on your stomach.  When active this cbm will prevent you from feeling any hunger.  Sideeffects may include malnutrition and permanent metabolic disruption.
The Deathsleep Neuralware fakes the pallor and symptoms of death.  When activated the user actively pretends to be dead and reduces the aggression of nearby enemies.
